item.title: How far are tourist attractions from Grand Vistara?
item.description: Grand Vistara is situated at Cochin International Airport, which is nearby to a lot of tourist attractions that must be seen when visiting Kerala. Here are the distances to various attractions: Destination Distance (km) CUSAT 14.5 WonderLa 15 Kerala Museum 15.9 Oberon Mall 18.4 LuLu Mall 17.3 Edappally Church 18 Marine Drive 30 Athirappilly Falls 40 Cherai Beach 26 Fort Kochi 44 Vypin 28 Thrissur 50 Alappuzha 107
